name: RANDOM LEGEND
description:
RANDOM LEGEND is a 2D side-scrolling game about exploration, growth, and endless random challenges.

You're teleported to a mysterious World and not sure how. And now you must conquer this place to find a way back home.

Begin your search, explore the Randomly Generated Worlds and battle endless enemies with rare and special abilities.

In RANDOM LEGEND, Fight Enemies, Complete Quests, Gain Loot, Upgrade your Legend! Random Quests and challenges await! Pets Coming Soon!
